definition: democracy/civil liberties/principle of democracy, the second of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning widespread popular involvement in affairs of state)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Chatper Five is a retrospection about the practice of civil rights in Guangxi.
sentences.chinese: 第五部分爲廣西民權主義實踐的檢討。

sentences.english: Thought of "Separation of Three Powers" is important contents of Sun Yat-sen's Principle of Democracy.
sentences.chinese: 五權分立思想是孫中山民權主義的重要內容。

sentences.english: Chapter 1 concerns the origin and planning for the practice of civil right thoughts in Guangxi.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分爲民權主義在廣西實踐的緣起與籌劃。
